closed_reason: Modified renderTicks() in app.js to sort Done column by closed_at timestamp descending (most recently closed on top). Other columns retain priority-based sorting.
notes: 2026-01-16 22:39 - Done column now sorts by closed_at descending (most recently closed on top). Changed renderTicks() in app.js to separate done ticks from others and apply different sorting logic.
title: Kanban: sort done in order of when they were closed
